title: Natural gas production - United States 1998 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in billion cubic meters, containing a total of 20 data points.
In general Production in billion cubic meters has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Production in billion cubic meters, about 831.8 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Production in billion cubic meters about 511.1 was reached at Year 2005
